gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To accustom oneself to something different
pomeni privaditi se nečemu, kar je drugačno.

seg.quote: He sat very still, trying to accustom himself to the darkness.
I think it is preferable to accustom babies to sleeping on the stomach.
I am not accustomed to being interrupted.
